name: cli-driver
description: Automate your complex CLI applications, like webdriver but for the command line

scripts.test-all-js: npm run clean && npm run build && node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js --config=./spec/support/jasmine-all-js.json
scripts.test-critical-coverage-html-report: rm -rf coverage; nyc --clean -r lcov -e .ts -x "*Spec.ts" ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine --config=./spec/support/jasmine-critical.json
scripts.docs: tsc && typedoc --options typedoc.ts && npx markdown-toc README.md -i && rm -rf ../../docs/doc-assets && cp -r ../../doc-assets ../../docs && git add ../../docs/doc-assets
scripts.help:
node -p "'
Help on this package's npm scripts:
'+JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(require('shelljs').cat('package.json').toString())['scripts-description'], null, 2)+'
'"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-all && npm run test-all-js && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.all-from-scratch: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json && ncu -u && npm i && npm run all
